author: mukulg
msg: committing an improved PsychoPath XPath2 jar, to support fixes for jira issues XERCESJ-1468 and XERCESJ-1408.

author: mukulg
msg: committing fixes for jira issue XERCESJ-1468. this also fixes issue XERCESJ-1408. to solve this issue, we enhanced the PsychoPath XPath engine to be able to store an XPath2 sequence into an user-defined variable (please see following Eclipse XPath2 bug report, https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=325262). i'm also committing an enhanced PsychoPath jar, which supports fixes for these Xerces jira issues.
